description: These shiitake mushroom and tofu meatballs are flavored with savory seasonings and drenched in a sticky ginger glaze. Serve them up as a fun party appetizer, or add some rice and veggies for a flavor-packed meal.
name: Ginger Glazed Tofu Meatballs
recipeIngredient: 4 oz. shiitake mushrooms, (stems removed and coarsely chopped (about 2 cups)
2 tbsp. unflavored soy or almond milk

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 375Â°. Like a couple of baking sheets with parchment and brush lightly with oil.

Place tofu, mushrooms, onion, garlic, panko, milk, soy sauce, flaxseed, liquid smoke and pepper into food processor bowl. Pulse until well mixed and crumbly, stopping to scrape down sides of bowl as needed. Roll into about 20 balls and arrange on baking sheet. Brush with oil.
Bake 30 minutes, turning about halfway through.
